Liono: ::Arrives at maximal base:: OK this is the battle Lay out it will be 
in 4 goals 
1. We are airborne and have an advantage so Step one is to Keep them from 
landing on the island. Each of you will have a rocket launcher and try to 
neutralize the Target.
2. If the Preds make land fall fall back to section 3 .2 which is the 
Holozone and weather control zone which the Cubes will react under my command.
3.The last line off defense is One on one style pick a pred and Square off 
Call you target if you have heavy damage retreat and me or another will pick 
up the slack.
4. We must protect the arc and the maximal base.
5. If I say Fall back you Do it that means ...........................
Break
